Security

Both your client area and cPanel are guarded with two-factor authentication. Every webpage hit is scanned in real-time for threats such as SQL injection and malware. We backup your website to Amazon S3 with versioning and one year retention so you can always go back in time and restore your website to a previous working version.

Speed

With advanced technologies such as CloudFlare CDN/AnyCast DNS, plus Nginx and powerful hardware, your website is among the fastest on the Internet. That means happier visitors and lower CPC cost.

Interface

Our client area is based on the latest responsive bootstrap interface. It looks beautiful on desktop and any type of mobile devices. The layout was designed so everything is at your fingertips. cPanel is also integrated into the client area so you don't have to go to each cPanel server to manage your websites.

Support

You get great around the clock support from our knowledgeable staff within minutes. You can reach us on Facebook, Twitter, online chat, skype, email and our ticketing system.
